long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the vibrant world of Arcane with this mesmerizing live wallpaper extension, featuring six iconic characters!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A stunning interface with a color palette of blue, purple, and green, capturing the essence of Arcane’s magical world and characters.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that harmonizes with the dynamic visuals of the Arcane universe.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Immerse yourself in Arcane-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as powerful and intricate as the characters from Arcane.
